title: Energy management for the future
creator_credit: Melvana Communications Group, ONF | NFB, Patrick Loubert and Michael Melnyk
brief_description: Our society is rapidly depleting its energy bank. This film creates awareness of the seriousness of the situation, what measures the federal government has taken, and how each one of us can help slow down the rapid consumption of non-renewable resources.
